trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time view of data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供設計階段檢視之資料的<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDataSourceDesigner"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.XmlDesignerDataSourceView"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The name of the view in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 在資料來源檢視的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Generates design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control and returns a value indicating whether the data is sample or real data.
trans-unit.target: 產生符合相關聯的資料來源控制項之結構描述，並傳回值，指出資料範例還是實際資料的設計階段資料。

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的資料列數目下限。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is sample data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is live data.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示傳回的資料是範例資料，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示傳回的資料是即時的資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"></xref> object containing data to display at design time.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceView"> </xref>物件，其中包含要顯示在設計階段資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets a schema that describes the data source view that is represented by this view object.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述這個檢視物件所代表的資料來源檢視的結構描述。
